snippet.title: Novalie Teaser
snippet.description:
Surreal horror themed visual novel, with lots of branching paths, blood, tears and twisted pitch-black humour. You're playing as Ashia, who's forced to marry her slimy uncle. Then she meets Novalie. And then things gets REALLY strange.

More info: http://novalie.biscuitplacebo.com
Download on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1865280/Novalie/
